name: Mixing Mercury
description:
Mixing Mercury is a first person science games in which you take the chemicals scattered around your lab and dump them into a mixing vat to see what crazy materials you can make.

Note: The current game may not make too much sense, but there are a few thing you to experiment with, have fun and updates may appear, maybe.

This was made as a university assignment, my co-creators are listed below:

Mark Crawford

Olafur Karl Stefansson

Caius Le Couteur
